title: Tank
description: She took care of me, and now I'll take care of her.After being shot, the guys decide I have to go to a real doc.Luckily she's a nurse who is a five foot two brunette bombshell with legs for days.I'll make sure to repay her for her kindness.Again and again.When I find out sheâ€™s pregnant with my baby, I realize the club might not be the only thing in life.Can I have everything?When they are threatened, I have to decide. Noelle or the Bad Disciples. Family, or blood.Nobody touches either when I'm around.
author: Savannah Rylan
